name: Introduction to Religious Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the academic study of religion. It will explore the history, methodology, and theories in the field, and will provide students with the foundation for further study.

name: History of Religion
description: This course examines the forms and functions of religion in various cultures throughout history. It will cover the history of different religions and their various beliefs and practices.

name: Introduction to Religious Ethics
description: This course introduces students to the field of religious ethics. It will cover the ethical systems in different religious traditions and the relationship between ethics and religious beliefs.

name: Advanced Religious Ethics
description: This course provides an in-depth look at religious ethics. It will explore the major ethical theories in the field, and will examine the ethical issues that arise in particular religious traditions.
